=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: India’s growth story: Sectors poised to lead the next wave of market expansion
Source: Economic Times - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 05:55
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
India’s strong macro fundamentals, policy reforms, easing monetary conditions and revival in consumption and capex are expected to support growth and drive sectoral opportunities in FY27.

Sentiment: positive
URL: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/markets/stocks/news/indias-growth-story-sectors-poised-to-lead-the-next-wave-of-market-expansion/articleshow/126212534.cms
